# Dr. Mu'men Diraneyya Medical Clinic

> General and Laparoscopic Surgery Clinic in Amman, Jordan

## About

Dr. Mu'men Ma'moun Diraneyya (Arabic: د. مؤمن مأمون ديرانية), known as Abu Obayda Al-Jarrah (أبو عبيدة الجرّاح), is a board-certified general surgeon based in Amman, Jordan. He is a Fellow of the Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh (FRCS) with 30 years of surgical experience.

## Credentials

- Fellow of the Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh (FRCS)
- 30 years of experience in general surgery
- 25 years in Ministry of Health and Saudi military hospitals
- Part-time lecturer at Al-Balqa Applied University Medical School
- 14 years in humanitarian medical relief work

## Services

The clinic specializes in:

- Laparoscopic surgery (minimally invasive)
- Hernia repair (inguinal, umbilical, incisional)
- Gallbladder removal (cholecystectomy)
- Hemorrhoid treatment (HAL, Ligasure, laser, PPH stapler)
- Anal fissure surgery
- Anal fistula surgery (including LIFT procedure and FiLaC laser)
- Pilonidal sinus surgery (including SiLaC laser)
- Thyroid surgery
- Breast surgery
- Appendectomy
- Colon and rectal surgery
- Diabetic foot surgery
- Circumcision

## Location

Al-Noor Specialist Clinics Complex, 2nd Floor
13 Abdullah bin Jubair Street
Amman 11191, Jordan
(Next to Ibn Al-Haytham Hospital Emergency)

## Hours

- Saturday to Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
- Thursday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM
- Friday: Closed
- Ramadan hours: Saturday to Thursday 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM

## Consultation Fee

25 Jordanian Dinars (JOD)
